```{r}
# Allows us to read in excel files 
library(readxl)
library(writexl)
```

```{r}
Ang <- read_excel("CITRC//processed_data//Ang1Ang2_All_Plates_PD.xlsx",
                  sheet = "WideSampleData")
TNFR1 <- read_excel("CITRC//processed_data//sTNFR1_All_plates.xlsx",
                    sheet = "WideSampleData")
```

```{r}
master_sample_data <- merge(Ang, TNFR1, 
                            by = "Sample", 
                            all.y = TRUE)

colnames(master_sample_data) <- paste("PE", colnames(master_sample_data), sep = "_")

write_xlsx(
  master_sample_data,
  path = "CITRC//processed_data//CITRC_Sample_Data_Master_01042023.xlsx",
  col_names = TRUE
)
```
